duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage quoting analysts and ensure execution on key performance indicators for renewal orders
Provide guidance, training, and support to the renewal quoting analyst team
Establish relationships and collaborate with team leads of adjacent functions for process development
Drive effectiveness and process improvements for renewal quote creation/revision
Ensure on-time and accurate renewal quote creation and revisions
Review and ensure renewal pricing compliance with current policies and procedures
Assist with special projects related to the renewal quoting process

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree, or 5+ years' experience in an Operations, Product, or Specialists role within a B2B organization
